thread.title: One night at the Four Seasons, Beijing.
thread.title_full: One night at the Four Seasons, Beijing. - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: LadyA88
title: One night at the Four Seasons, Beijing.
text:
Our stay at the Four Seasons was just for one night, on route from Tianjin Port to Beijing Airport after a cruise. It was ideal for its proximity to the airport, although not centrally located to many places of interest.
The only comment I would make is that breakfast was very busy and we had to sit on low seats, which was not very comfortable.
